long_description: The spacious, 3-season NEMO Galaxi 2P Tent offers quality and innovation at an affordable price, with a great suite of fabrics and hardware that creates an intuitive tent design for 2 backpackers. 1-piece hubbed pole set makes setup simple and quick. Generous vestibules offer protected entry and dry gear storage; tie back one or both of the doors, or close both for full protection. MagTie(TM) magnetic door tie-backs make it simple to roll back your door and keep it out of the way. Place a headlamp (not included) in the overhead Light Pocket(TM); its special light-diffusing fabric casts an even glow throughout your tent. The NEMO Galaxi 2P Tent comes with a coated ripstop nylon footprint to help protect its floor from abrasion; webbing stake-outs at the corners allow easy attachment.
short_description: The spacious, 3-season NEMO Galaxi 2P Tent offers quality and innovation at an affordable price, with a great suite of fabrics and hardware that creates an intuitive tent design for 2 backpackers.
